view_set_visible: This function can be used to set the visibility of the given view port. The function takes the view port index (from 0 to 7) and a boolean <tt>true</tt> if it is visible and <tt>false</tt> if it is not.
Visibility toggle (<tt>true</tt> is visible and <tt>false</tt> is invisible)
The above code will check to see if the view port[0] is visible and if it is not it is set to visible.
